name: HeavyCursedKnight
description:
Description

Game made for Blackthornprod's game jam 3  in one week.

Game is about guy who want to get stronger.

Everything was made during game jam.

How it fits the theme?

You start with full armor set and slowly you take it off. After each piece of armor taken off you have new ability.

So the less armor you have, the more skills you get.

How to play?

AD  - move left/right

W /SPACE - jump

E - interaction

Left Shift - dash

Credits Music

Made by NOLES

https://nolesound.itch.io/

Game

Made by MatherPL, SeprAY

Some error 

I forgot to check loop time in menu sorry for that I'll send new version after voting will end.
